articles.description: The Queen and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, spoke with volunteers from the Royal Voluntary Service and NHS Volunteer Responders about their work during the pandemic
articles.content:
The Queen has been seen for the first time since Meghan and Prince Harry's controversial Oprah Winfrey interview in a video chat.
The Monarch joined daughter-in-law Camilla to speak to volunteers of… [+4074 chars]

articles.author: Karen Ruiz, Andrew Court
articles.title: Armie Hammer accuser 'denied she had been raped', two months earlier, Instagram messages show - Daily Mail
articles.description: A screenshot shared exclusively with DailyMail.com appears to show Armie Hammer's accuser, Effie, 24, had told an Instagram follower earlier this year that the actor did not rape her.
articles.content: The 24-year-old woman who claims she was sexually assaulted by Armie Hammer allegedly denied to a friend that the actor had raped her and admitted their encounter was 'consensual', two months before … [+14078 chars]
